price: 115. Nummah Nabii Mucammadow Nabii Aadam farrinneeh kaa amrisneh caxak yakmek duma, teetik akke waamah, tokkel usuk too farrimtu hawweeneeh, kaa как waasneemik diggaa kee sabri kaal magennino.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿahid'nā ilā ādama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu ʿazman
